title: Chapter 956 - Godlike Powers Of Prediction
volume_title: A Sword Cleaves A Path Through The Netherworld
body:
Chapter 956 - Godlike Powers Of Prediction

Beneath the ancient tree.

Su Yi leaned back into his chair, his legs resting on the table. From time to time, he picked up his jug of wine and took a sip.

The big, fat, orange cat curled up in his arms, not daring to move a muscle.

This only made the young man in blue seem even more languid.

But this also left Wang Chonglu and Qu Boling feeling even more conflicted.

When the Divine Saber Demon Emperor Zhan Beiqi emerged from the main hall, he too was dazed. Then, he pursed his lips and strode outside.

However, just as he was about to pass through the courtyard doors, Su Yi suddenly said, “Did you come to the City of Eternal Night to kill Liu Changsheng, or to help him?”

Zhan Beiqi’s majestic figure froze. After a moment’s silence, he said, “Mind your own business.”

With that, he pushed open the door and left.

From beginning to end, he didn’t so much as turn his head.

Su Yi stroked the orange cat’s silky fur and laughed. Zhan Beiqi hasn’t changed at all!

“The third guest can now enter.” The green bird’s voice emanated from within the main hall.

Qu Boling was already ready and waiting. He took a deep...
